description:
In addition to a portion of average viewers, Disney has received criticism from high-profile individuals including Elon Musk and Nelson Peltz that the company have become too “woke.” Now Disney CEO Bob Iger has called out the use of the word “woke,” something which he immediately shut down. This criticism became especially notable when, on [...]

The post Disney CEO Bob Iger Says A Lot Of People Don’t Understand What “Woke” Means appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Disney CEO Bob Iger Says A Lot Of People Don’t Understand What “Woke” Means
